About Us

We believe in a learner-centered approach, where individuals have the flexibility to learn at their own pace and convenience. Our platform offers a user-friendly interface, making it easy for learners to navigate and access the content they need.

What Is bdCalling

bdCalling IT Ltd is a freelancing-based company that started its journey in 2014 from a small corner of the drawing room of the honorable CEO MD. Monir Hossain of bdCalling IT. We started with a computer that 5 members used. However, bdCalling IT is a company of 450 members now. We work in 6 categories Business Support, Web Design and Development, Software Development, Visual and Graphics Design, Digital Marketing, and Skill Development. Additionally, bdCalling IT is working as a group of companies with SMT, SparkTech Agency, Softvence, and Backbenchers Studio.

01

Our Mission

At bdCalling Academy, our mission is clear and gripping to empower individuals with the knowledge and skills they need to thrive in a developing world. We believe that learning is the key to unlocking limitless opportunities, and we are committed to helping you reach your full potential.

02

Our Vision

Develop the skills and experience you need to succeed, and get noticed by the best companies. Meet real people who turned their education into incredible careers. At bdCalling Academy, we believe that everyone should have the opportunity to learn and grow, and achieve their career goals.

03

Our Values

Unlock Your Creativity: Inspire learners to tap into their creative potential with our platform's innovative courses and resources.

Integrity at the Core: Emphasize the correctness and ethical standards our platform upholds in delivering quality education.

Collaborative Learning: Highlight the power of collaborative learning experiences that foster teamwork and a sense of community among users.

Explore Excellence: Encourage learners to strive for excellence in their education and personal growth through our learning platform.

04

Our History

Since our inception in 2014, our company has been dedicated to providing top-notch digital services to clients across the world. Over the years, our commitment to solving complex problems has not only fueled our growth but also enriched our knowledge base. bdCalling Academy believes that by using our knowledge and skill , we can create a positive impact on society.
